snippet.title: Sticky Struggles - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Sticky Struggles is now available on Steam!

Get it now or wishlist it on Steam!
▶ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1931070/

Inspired by the classic Sokoban games, Sticky Struggles adds its own unique gameplay mechanics. When you're located next to a block, it sticks to you, and the only way to let go of it is by placing it in the correct location! Are you ready for the challenge?

⭐ RELAX AND FOCUS — Enjoy a minimalist game world with relaxing music. No flashy visuals and loud sound effects.

⭐ LOTS OF LEVELS — Play through 50 challenging levels! Once completed, you get instant access to 25 bonus levels!

⭐ ACHIEVEMENTS — There are plenty of achievements to earn, can you obtain them all?

⭐ CHALLENGING — There are multiple ways to solve each level. Can you figure out how to solve it in the lowest amount of moves possible?

⭐ 2D & 3D — You can easily toggle between 2D and 3D view.

*********

▶ Subscribe to Paction Games for more: https://www.youtube.com/pactiongames/?sub_confirmation=1

▶ Follow us on Social Media: 
www.stickystruggles.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pactiongames/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pactiongames/
X: @pactiongames
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pactiongames/

*********

Paction Games, the Paction Games logo, Sticky Struggles, the Sticky Struggles logo as well as any materials derived from Sticky Struggles are trademarks or registered trademarks of and/or owned by Paction Games ApS, including, without limitation, artwork, character art, titles and designs. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
